snippet.title: Hero's Fever Dream: Full Mod + All Endings (Omori mod)
snippet.description:
this is by far one of if not the best Omori mod as to date, its really hard to pick between Reverie and this mod, in all honesty
Mod description:
WARNING!
To start playing the mod make sure to press NEW GAME! Trying to continue from an OMORI save file could very well cause a crash!
It is HEAVILY recommended you experience this with only the mod itself, cause it hasn't been tested how this mod runs with other mods!

TROUBLESHOOT
Q: My main menu doesn't look right, it's all bugged!
A: This is a common bug that happens if you have a save from another mod that messes around the main menu! It should be fixed by saving in HFD! (Or by simply just removing everything from the save folder)

ABOUT THE MOD:
HERO's Fever Dream is a mod that tackles the aftermath of the truth from OMORI.
Including:
3 ENDINGS
SECRETS
BADGES
NEW MECHANICS
And more!

CREDITS

PRODUCER/CREATOR

KENWAY
EL XD

ART

NEBULAPHILE
TARU
KENWAY
LEE
CLOUD_PAINTER
WATTA
EL XD

CODING

DRAUGHT
FOG
HIME

PLAYTESTING

LEE
EL XD
KENWAY

You'll forgive him, won't you HERO?, Reverie has ALOT more content but story wise. this mod is better

mod link: https://mods.one/mod/hfd

00:00 Door 1
06:50 Door 2
11:57 Door 3
18:11 Tax Fraud boss 
22:10 Last Resort
27:37 Neutral Ending
30:14 Good Ending
33:25 Bad ending
